trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event occurs when the selection state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>就會發生事件時的選取狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>來自變更選取為已取消選取或取消選取此選項為選取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> will not occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>如果不會發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>處於虛擬模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 選取狀態已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 選取狀態已變更之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the item's state has changed to selected; <see langword="false" /> to indicate the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示項目的狀態變更為已選取，而 <see langword="false" /> 則表示項目的狀態變更為已取消選取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item's state has changed to selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出項目的狀態是否變更為已選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item's state has changed to selected; <see langword="false" /> if the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的狀態變更為已選取，則為 <see langword="true" />，但如果項目的狀態變更為已取消選取，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取狀態已變更的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 選取狀態已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取狀態已變更之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 選取狀態已變更之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> 的索引。
